org.livingdoc.converters

Class CharacterConverter

  • org.livingdoc.converters.CharacterConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeConverter<T>

    public class CharacterConverter
implements TypeConverter<T>

    This converter is used to convert a String with a length of 1 to a char

    • Constructor Detail

      • CharacterConverter

        public CharacterConverter()

        This converter is used to convert a String with a length of 1 to a char

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        @NotNull
public java.lang.Character convert(@NotNull
                                            java.lang.String value,
                                            @Nullable
                                            java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement element,
                                            @Nullable
                                            java.lang.Class<?> documentClass)

        This function converts the given parameter value with a length of 1 to a char. If the length of value is not 1, this function throws a Conversion exception.

        Parameters:
        value - the String that should have a length of 1
        Returns:
        the char value of the given String
        Throws:
        ConversionException - if the length is not 1

      • canConvertTo

        public boolean canConvertTo(@NotNull
                            java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
